title: Is the number 27 strong in numerology? - Quora

response.answer_text: Q: Is the number 27 strong in numerology? A: yes. 27/9. Is very strong. Very much. Keywords: love, compassion, patience, universality, tolerance, self-denial, service, outcomes. Since love encompasses everything, it must apply its energy to the service to the universe. A vision of impersonal truth( just, generous,benevolent and patient). 9 is the last stage of learning. All the experience of the road, reaches a total understanding and tolerance with respect to the points of view and prejudices of others. 9 is already prepared to give back to the universe what he learned during the previous eight grades. The law of ciclicity does not allow losses and demands yield in exchange for consumption. Accepted in this way, the 9 brings joy as a gift of life and freedom to enter the next cycle without hindrance. Astrological correspondence is the fire element.Aries, Leo and Sagittarius. The ace of wands indicates that the person must obey his own intuition and not deviate from what he thinks is fair. Inventive, creative and inspired . 9 treats with originality what it touches. Art and beauty, peace and justice are theirs.

Number 27 = 9 Let us first understand these numbers Number 2 shows partnerships, consultations and has feminine attributes. Due to these qualities, the partnerships associated with this number are more emotional in nature than strategic and has its own constraints. Number 7 is a number for spirituality and focused nature. It brings out the meditative and contemplative nature of a person. It is the accumulator of knowledge, wisdom, intellect and also makes one an abstract thinker. Coming to number 27 in Vedic Numerology, which has the significations of planet Moon and Neptune (Ketu, south node of moon). It reduces to number 9 which represents planet Mars. Moon gets afflicted with the nodes. It cannot be said concretely that this is a strong number because it has effect of 2 unstable and weak numbers. Ultimately it reduces to 9 which shows spirituality and humanitarian attitude towards life.
